name: promise-worker-bi
description: Bidirectional communication with a Web Worker using Promises

scripts.build: rimraf dist && mkdirp dist && browserify -s PromiseWorker -p bundle-collapser/plugin . > dist/promise-worker-bi.js && uglifyjs -mc < dist/promise-worker-bi.js > dist/promise-worker-bi.min.js
scripts.istanbul-combine: istanbul-combine -d coverage -r json coverage/coverage.json coverage/coverage-worker.json && mv coverage/coverage-final.json coverage/coverage.json && rimraf coverage/coverage-worker.json
scripts.coverage: COVERAGE=1 run-scripts build-test test-for-coverage istanbul-combine istanbul-report istanbul-check

author: Nolan Lawson <nolan@nolanlawson.com>
